column2: "Na wobuu Israel nyinara ano dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ananakan tsetsee; na
column4: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo nwoma no mu: na wɔfaa Juda ndɔmmum kɔr Babilɔn wɔ hɔn mbrato ntsi."

column2: "Afei atsefo a wodzi kan a wɔtsenaa hɔn enyadze mu wɔ hɔn nkurow mu nye Israel

column5: na Efraim na Manaasɛmba no mu binom tsenatsenaa hɔ;"
Bani a ofi Juda ne ba Perez ne mba mu no ebusuasantsen mu."

column2: "na hɔn nuanom dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusuasantsen tsetsee
column3: ahaakron eduonum esia. Mbarimba yi nyinara wɔyɛ egyanom efiefi do etsitsir dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi tsetsee."

column6: na Ahitub a nna ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne fie ɔpanyin no hɔn ebusuasantsen mu."

column4: apem ahaesuon eduosia; mbarimba ara a wotum Nyankopɔn ne fie ɔsom edwuma yɛ."

column8: ebusua mu a ɔtse Netofatfo nkuroba mu no."

column6: na hɔn nuanom: Sallum nye otsitsir;"

column2: "ɔno na ahyɛse no ara ogyinaa ɔhen no kuropon ano boka afamu: hɔn na wɔyɛ Levimba nseraban mbobowano ahwɛfo."

column6: na no nuanom a wofi n'egya fie. Korafo no nna wɔhwɛ ɔsom edwuma no do
column7: ntamadan no no mbobotsenano ahwɛfo a: na hɔn egyanom
column8: EWURADZE ne nseraban no do ahɛnee no ano ahwɛfo a;"

column2: "na Eleazar ne ba Finehas nna odzii hɔn do ɔpanyin mber a etwa mu no
"Woyinom nyinara a wɔsaan mu yii hɔn dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ mbobowano ahwɛfo wɔ mbobotsenano no wɔyɛ ahaenu duebien. Woyinom na wobuu ano hɔn ebusuasantsen do wɔ hɔn nkurobaase
column3: hɔn na David na ɔdzehunyi Samuel dze hɔn sisii hɔn nokwardzi edwuma mu."

column2: "Hɔn na hɔn mba hwɛɛ EWURADZE fie mbobotsen no ano
"Na hɔn nuanom a wɔwɔ hɔn nkurobaase
column3: ɔwɔ dɛ wɔba nda esuon biara mu ofi ber to ber bɛka hɔn ho:"

column2: "na mbobowano ahwɛfo etsitsir baanan no a wɔyɛ Levifo no
column4: na wɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn ne fie mpia na adzekorabea no do."

column2: "Na wɔtsetse Nyankopɔn ne dan no ho bɔ ho aprɔw
column3: osiandɛ hɔn asɛdze nye dɛ wɔweɔn
column4: na no mbuei anapa anapa no yɛ hɔn asodzii."

column2: "Na hɔn mu binom hwɛ ɔsom ndzɛmba no do; osiandɛ wobu ano dze ba mu
"Wɔdze hɔn mu binom so sisii dan mu ndzɛmba no
"Na asɔfomba no binom dze nduhuam foraforae yɛɛ ɔserango no."

column4: a ɔyɛ Koranyi Sallum n'abakan no
column5: nyaa nokwar edwuma wɔ ndzɛmba a wɔto no wɔ kyesɛn mu no do."

column2: "Na hɔn nuanom no a wofi Kohatfo mu no mu binom na wɔhwɛ kyerɛpaanoo no do

column3: Levifo mu egyanom efiefi do etsitsir a wɔtsenaa mpia mu na wɔnnyɛ edwuma nkaa no bi: osiandɛ hɔn edwuma da hɔn do adzekyee na adzesaa."

column2: "Woyinom nye Levifo mu egyanom efiefi do etsitsir
column4: nyimpa tsitsir: woyinom na wɔtsenaa Jerusalɛm."

column3: Jeiel a ne yer dzin dze Maaka tsenae:"

column2: "Na Miklot woo Simea. Na hɔn so wɔnye hɔn nuanom tsenaa Jerusalɛm
column3: wɔ hɔn nuanom no hɔn tsentsendo."

column2: "Na Ner woo Kish; na Kish woo Saul; na Saul woo Jonatan
"Na Jonatan ne ba nye Merib-baal; na Merib-baal woo Mika."
"Na Ahaz woo Jara; na Jara woo Alemet
column4: na Zimri; na Zimri woo Moza:"

column2: "na Moza woo Binea; na Binea woo Refaia

column8: na Hanan: woyinom nye Azel ne mba."
